OOC: Normally I accept damage, but it's just common sense it would 
work this way.  And for pities sake Thirst is to important in my plan 
for you guys to slag.

BIC:  When Thirst hears Lady Right he instinctivly ducks with Void and 
dodges all fire.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Joint post alert. LN wrote for Void whiel I wrote for everyone 
> else..   
> 
> BIC:(I wrote)   Lady Right watches Thirst and Void Fight.  She 
> develops a plan in her head,  she yells at Void, "Duck."
> 
> (LN wrote)   When Lady Right says duck, void drops to the ground as 
> he quickly draws a blaster from his cloak. In an instant the air 
> infront of the blaster crackles and heats up as a red lazer beam 
flys 
> forward and right at Thirsts gut. 
> 
> (I wrote)   When the 3 predacons sees Void duck they all open fire. 
 
> Lepord fires 4 shoots from his Gut Gun and 4 Eye Lasers at Thirst's 
> head.  Lady Right fires 25 bullets all together from her 6 legs and 
> fires 4 Eye Lasers at Thirst's chest and Lobstruck fires 5 Eye 
Lasers 
> at Thirst's right arm.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I simply posted that his hands went above his head and I 
would 
> > have sounded stupid saying that he tried to force them up, but 
that 
> > didn't involve damage so...
> > 
> > BIC:  Thirst grabbed his arm before it reached his chest and went 
> for 
> > the artery (he has that right?).
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > The moment thirst had voids arms above his head voids eyes 
> exploded 
> > in a 
> > > bright light, blinding thirst. A second later void lept into the 
> air 
> > and 
> > > slammed the sole of his foot upside thirsts head before sending 
a 
> > clawed hand 
> > > at Thirsts chest creating a deep gash.
> > > 
> > > OOC: Fine want to post what happens to my charachter Dewboy, I 
> can 
> > do the 
> > > same.
